PromotionExecEvalGrpItem.name: PromotionExecEvalGrpItem
PromotionExecEvalGrpItem.description: Represents either a promotion or a promotion group in a promotion execution evaluation group.

CurrentItemRecordId.description: The ID of promotion or the promotion group that the item record belongs to.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the promotion execution evaluation group item.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of this record.

ParentPromEvaluationGroupId.description: The ID of the parent execution evaluation group

PreviousItemRecordId.description: The ID of the promotion or promotion group that's sequenced before the current item.
